name: COMBINIMALS
description:
Uh oh! A horde of stuffed animals are quickly closing in on you. Armed with only your trusty needle, your task is to sew them together into the largest plush you can!

COMBINIMALS is an action game in which you stitch enemies together. Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, in COMBINIMALS, you knock enemies into each other to combine them into larger enemies in lieu of defeating them. Use a combination of melee and ranged attacks to create the largest stuffed animal you can!
